original_text: And he put the coat on him and tied the sash around his waist and clothed him with the robe and put the ephod on him and tied the skillfully woven band of the ephod around him, binding it to him with the band.
korean_text: 아론에게 속옷을 입히며 띠를 띠우고 겉옷을 입히며 에봇을 걸쳐 입히고 에봇의 장식 띠를 띠워서 에봇을 몸에 매고

sentences.original_text: And he put the coat on him
and tied the sash around his waist
and clothed him with the robe
and put the ephod on him
and tied the skillfully woven band of the ephod around him
sentences.korean_translation: 그에게 정교하게 짠 에봇의 띠를 매었습니다

sentences.original_text: binding it to him with the band.
